item.title: The Case of Unknown Custom Object Property
item.description: In the last two or three months, I have been busy working on a complete end to end deployment automation solution and been writing lot of PowerShell code.

item.title: PowerShell Linux to Windows integration (encoding problem)
item.description: In my life I try to be on the edge of IT technology and if I find something interesting I try to be in touch with it.
